title: Japanese Given Names: Data, Analysis, and Interactive Resources
description: This repository provides curated datasets, analysis code, and visualization tools for the empirical study of contemporary Japanese given names. It includes frequency data harvested from public web sources, cleaned and normalized datasets, diversity and distribution metrics, and code for interactive exploration and visualization. Developed in support of the book 'Gender in Japanese Names Today', the  resource is intended as a general platform for computational and quantitative research on Japanese given names.
notes: Some of the datasets included here contain material originally compiled by other authors and remain under their respective copyrights. These are included for research and educational purposes. Please check the source attribution files in the `data/` directory for detailed credits and license terms.
